title: Dummy Component for Communes
config: { "query": "select distinct ?canton (count(?comm) as ?count) where {?cant a <http://lindas-data.ch/def/top/Canton>.?cant <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#prefLabel> ?canton.?dist <http://lindas-data.ch/def/top/isPartOf> ?cant.?comm <http://lindas-data.ch/def/top/isPartOf> ?dist.?comm a <http://lindas-data.ch/def/top/Commune>.FILTER(LANGMATCHES(LANG(?canton), "de"))} group by ?canton order by ?count LIMIT", "location":null }
